Game.Name: Famicom Mini 10 - Star Soldier (Japan) (En)
Game.plot: Famicom Mini: Star Soldier is an Action game, published by Nintendo,which was released in Japan in 2004.Cheat: Full Power-UpThis code will give you a fully powered up ship with a 5-way shot and the very powerful laser. After entering the code and starting the game, press select to switch between the 5-way shot and the laser. At the title screen, press 'select' ten times, press and hold 'up/left, A, B' then press 'start' twice.
